column4: hey guys. anyone know a good soundcard that's well supported in ubuntu?
turtle beach montego DDL and sound blaster audigy2 series... (NOT x-fi though)
thanks. i'll look them up see which i like better :)

i just got the montego.  it's better for music and audio connectivity/etc (not sure if spdif-in is supported in linux or not).  audigy is good for hardware game acceleration, but linux doesnt support that anyway
